title: Snap doubles down on smart glasses with new independent unit
description: The launch of the Specs unit comes as the success of Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses positions eyewear as an early frontrunner in the race for gadgets powered by artificial intelligence.
content:
Snap will create an independent subsidiary for its augmented reality smart glasses, as it looks to attract external investment and challenge bigger rival Meta in the fast-growing wearables market.

title: Google says AI agent can now browse on users’ behalf
description: Google is launching an artificial intelligence assistant on its Chrome browser that can open websites and click around on a user's behalf.
content:

title: Korean Won Heads for Longest Rally in 13 Years on Inflows, AI
description: The South Korean won is set for its longest winning streak in 13 years as exuberance over artificial intelligence and inflows ahead of a key bond index inclusion buoy the currency.
content:

title: Why ET AI Conclave & Awards 2025 is the strategic event India’s AI builders cannot ignore
description: The ET AI Conclave and Awards in Bengaluru have become one of Indias most important crossroads for artificial intelligence innovation, leadership, and strategic dialogue. For founders, CXOs, policymakers, and investors focused on building AI solutions that deliver measurable results, missing this event means losing access to critical insights, relationships, and credibility. The awards spotlight excellence that matters and the conclave drives meaningful conversations on governance, adoption, and real world impact in AI.
